channel.title: Blogs on Climate Change
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Climate Change

item.title: Climate Change
item.description: Motivation The science underpinning the belief in man made climate change is rigorous, well tested and has existed for nearly two centuries. It is only in the last few years, however, that people have begun to question the science. Pendley was the Director of the Bureau of Land Management. This concerned me. But is this a case of the loud minority? Or something more.. Maybe I can quantify it. Data Using a dataset from CrowdFlower I’m able to retrain a Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning model created by Google named BERT.
